English: <s>Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."</s>

English: <s>A doctor who worked at Children's Hospital of Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania will be charged with aggravated murder after her mother was found dead in the trunk of her car Wednesday, authorities in Ohio say.</s>

English: <s>When you travel, you don't expect things to be the same as they are at home. The modes, the laws, the food, the transport, the accommodation, the standards, the language and other things will be, at least to a certain extent, different from what you are used to.</s>
